lender.name: Paul & Kim Bell
lender.loan_because: This is a great way to help people better their lives and become self sufficient . We all need to do what we can to help our brothers and sisters around the world.
lender.occupational_info: I sell Telecom services such as local, long distance, data , internet, voice broadcast and many more telecom services at wholesale rates to business clients in the US.

lender.name: Patrick
lender.loan_because:
The world and people in it have been very good to me and I have made it a point to give back.
"For everyone to whom much is given, from him much will be required"
lender.occupational_info: Marketing Firm Senior Partner

lender.name: Adrian
lender.loan_because: It helps people.
lender.occupational_info: Teach people the beautiful game.

lender.name: Chantel
lender.loan_because: I think it's a good and positive thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I take care of my home and am a model with my mom's photography business. We make photographs together of me that highlight my disabilities to help educate others about people who are blind and disabled.

lender.name: Mario N Heriales
lender.loan_because: I believe the power of sharing...
lender.occupational_info: Iam publishing a free monthly magazine called REPUBLIKA for Filipino migrants here in Japan for almost 9yrs now.

lender.name: Michael ein Rheinländer
lender.loan_because: It is a great idea to help people helping themselves.

lender.name: Joan
lender.loan_because: it feels good to help others who may not have the ability to finance their dreams and become self sufficient in a small business.
lender.occupational_info: In my job I get to help people with loans to small businesses in my area. With Kiva I can help others who are not in my area.

lender.name: Becky
lender.loan_because: Jesus tells me to love my neighbor.
lender.occupational_info: I help college students love and serve God.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: I have been to various parts of the world and wish to share resources I have to help others, just as I would want to be helped.
lender.occupational_info: I work with families who are in crises and helping young adults become independent. Sometimes I take young adults to developing countries to development work: with the group and with the community we visit.

lender.name: Ben
lender.loan_because: I want to do what I can to see hardworking people succeed.
lender.occupational_info: In my work, I help create materials to educate people, especially in child literacy. I also study ways that business can help people and the environment.

lender.name: Michael & Lynn
lender.loan_because: It's Simply great to be able to.

lender.name: Dan Allan
lender.loan_because: It is the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I help people achieve their financial goals and get their financial life in order.

lender.name: Carly
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves an opportunity.

lender.name: Jane
lender.loan_because: My sister, Trish, loves me and others less fortunate than herself, so she has blessed me with this opportunity to give, as her gift to me! I love her, and I love those that God loves. What a wonderful way to share with Him, her, and everyone else we in America's South call, "Y'all"!
lender.occupational_info: I create opportunities for people who do not know the Author of Life and His Son, Jesus, to get together and share in God's love. Through my artwork, Bible studies, prayer, meals from house to house, or just Life, it is all about HIM!

lender.name: William
lender.loan_because: I want to help other aspiring entrepreneurs... and the stories are amazing!
lender.occupational_info: I help organizations improve their financial operations.

lender.name: Carsten
lender.loan_because: I hope that it will be helpful.

lender.name: Amy
lender.loan_because: ...I am blessed to have the means to do so. I want to see women around the world succeed in making better lives for themselves and their families.

lender.name: Dolf
lender.loan_because: I want to give others an apportunity to have a more easy life.
lender.occupational_info: I entertain people. Just look at the site http://www.acteur.nl

lender.name: Sherri
lender.loan_because: I love Africa!!!
lender.occupational_info: I am the Administrator for several non-denominational churches across the Southern United States. My husband is the overseer of the ministry.

lender.name: Fiona
lender.loan_because: I'm have an entrepreneurial spirit and am happy to support someone with a desire to create and pay it forward!
lender.occupational_info: I use a computer to create design.

lender.name: Jeremy
lender.loan_because: I want to make the world a better place.
lender.occupational_info: I fix broken computers mostly. Also I teach a little.

lender.name: Margaret
lender.loan_because: I care about people.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a company that helps people with mental illness live independently in the community-not in institutions. I answer telephones and work with clients.

lender.name: Jean-Paul
lender.occupation: School Teacher & Executive Director for OPAES
lender.loan_because:
OPAES: Oasis Project Africa Education Society OPAES is a non-profit organization without affiliation to government or religious organizations. 100% of donations to OPAES are used for its programs in Africa. Funds needed for administrative costs, such as postage, brochures, communication and so on are raised by the OPAES Board by other means and son on
OBJECTIVES: OPAES objectives for the Mulungano project are: 7. To sponsor women’s community based programs such as growing food and animal banking 8. To assist women with funds for small business and family income projects
lender.occupational_info: GOALS OPAES goals for the Mulungano micro loan project are: 1. Our goal is to sponsor 500 women for the micro loan project or cooperative project. Each woman will receive $50 to start her business. At the end of the month each recipient will donated back $2 to sponsor other programs. 2. The income from 200 women will be able to support the running of the elementary school 3. The income from 300 women will be able to support the running of the vocational school (2009project.) $8 women have been spornsored so far by OPAES. 402 women are waiting to be sponsored. Toal cost $20,100. Please let us know how many people you would like to sponsor.

lender.name: Robin
lender.loan_because: I hate to see innocent people be displaced and have their family killed because there is no money.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: one person improving their life will cause others to improve their life.
lender.occupational_info: I write LISP and PML programs to enable draughtsmen to do their job more efficiently

lender.name: Dale
lender.loan_because: God has blessed me with financial resources; it is only right that I share a part of my blessing with those less fortunate than me. Perhaps with a betterment of their situation, one day those I'm able to help will be able and willing to help one less fortunate than they...
lender.occupational_info: I own my own business, selling new and used office furniture in my city. (bhofficefurniture.com)

lender.name: Christopher
lender.loan_because: I loan because we all need a helping hand from time to time in this "dog eat dog world."
lender.occupational_info: www.myspace.com/degenerateboy

lender.name: Chris & Christy
lender.loan_because: Loaning to entrepreneurs helps everyone in the community where they live and work.

lender.name: nancy
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance.

lender.name: Chad and Steph
lender.loan_because: We want to support entrepreneurs in developing countries.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: We are so fortunate. If all of us who are able helped a little, our world would be a much better place.

lender.name: Dave
lender.loan_because: It's a small thing but to the recipient it might change a life. I've not had this kind of satisfaction since I was young and opened my first savings account and watched it grow. But this pays a better return when someone can invest in the opportunity to improve their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I'm an oil painter, watercolorist and draw in charcoal - portraits, landscapes and objects.

lender.name: Sue
lender.loan_because: A hand up is better than a handout
lender.occupational_info: I work with the mentally challenged

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: This is a great way to help out others.
lender.occupational_info: I am a high school student.

lender.name: Elise
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Ingvar
lender.loan_because:
IN ENGLISH: Because it contributes to emancipation, independence and a better life. EN ESPAÑOL: Porque contribuye a emancipación, independencia y una vida mejor. EN FRANÇAIS: Parce qu'il contribue à émancipation, indépendance et une vie meilleure.
IN ENGLISH: I lend money because this allows the hard work of the entrepreneur to give better income and a better life. However, unfortunately there are also risks. I know of these risks from my own experience: Years ago I was trapped in a debt that was too large, too difficult to pay, and it was awful. So please be careful! I really hope that you won't have any problems, and that this will work out very well for you. I sincerely hope that this becomes a step toward economic independence and a better life!
EN ESPAÑOL: Presto dinero porque esto permite que el trabajo tan duro del empresario dé ingresos mejores y una vida mejor. Sin embargo, lamentablemente también hay riesgos. Conozco a estos riesgos de mi propia experiencia: Hace años estaba atrapado en una deuda demasiado grande, demasiado difícil de pagar, y era terrible. Por tanto, ¡por favor tengan cuidado! Verdaderamente espero que no tendrán problemas, y que todo les irá muy bien. ¡Sinceramente espero que esto será un paso hacia independencia económica y una vida mejor!
EN FRANÇAIS: Je prête de l'argent parce que ça permet que le travaille si dur de l'entrepreneur donne plus de revenu et une vie meilleure. Cependant, malheureusement il y a aussi des risques. Je connais ces risques d'expérience propre: Il y a quelques années, j'étais piégé d'une dette trop grande, trop difficile de payer, et c'était terrible. Pourtant soyez prudentes s'il vous plaît! Vraiment j'espère que vous n'aurez pas des problèmes, et que tout ira très bien. Sincèrement j'espère que ceci sera un pas vers indépendance économique et une vie meilleure! .
lender.occupational_info:
IN ENGLISH: School teacher and computer programmer. EN ESPAÑOL: Profesor de escuela y programador de computadores. EN FRANÇAIS: Professeur des écoles et programmeur des ordinateurs.
IN ENGLISH: Through the years I've had several different occupations. I've been a substitute teacher in different schools in my home city of Stockholm. They would call me on the telephone when a teacher was ill and they wanted me to come and teach the children. I've also been an office worker and computer programmer for the main organization for the international language Esperanto (http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Esperanto). This was in their main office in Rotterdam, Netherlands. I've also been a computer programmer and website programmer for two companies in Stockholm.
EN ESPAÑOL: A través de los años he tenido varios trabajos distintos. He sido profesor de sustitución en varias escuelas en mi ciudad Estocolmo. Me llamaron por teléfono cuando un profesor estaba enfermo y querían que yo viniera a enseñar a los niños. También he sido trabajador de oficina y programador de computador para la organización principal del idioma internacional Esperanto (http://es.wikipedia.org/wiki/Esperanto). Esto fue en la oficina principal en Rotterdam, Países Bajos. También he sido programador de computador y programador de páginas Web en dos empresas en Estocolmo.
EN FRANÇAIS: Au cours des années j'ai eu des professions diverses. J'ai été professeur remplaçant dans diverses écoles dans ma ville Stockholm. On m'a appélé par téléphone quand un professeur était malade et on voulait que je vienne enseigner aux enfants. Aussi j'ai été travailleur de bureau et programmeur d'ordinateur pour l'organisation principal pour la langue international Espéranto (http://fr.wikipedia.org/wiki/Espéranto). Ça c'était dans leur bureau principal à Rotterdam, Pays-Bas. Aussi j'ai été programmeur d'ordinateur et programmeur des pages de Web dans deux entreprises à Stockholm.

lender.name: Steve&Jen
lender.loan_because: This is such a small and easy way to try and help others in parts of the world we will probably never get to visit.
lender.occupational_info:
Steve - I create maps and information for people in the town of Banff, Alberta, Canada.
Jen - I help to heal tired and aching muscles in a professional clinical atmosphere.

lender.name: Taylor
lender.loan_because: I feel blessed that I have the resources and the ability to help others. I think that helping others help themselves is one of the best ways to do good in the world. Thanks, Kiva!
lender.occupational_info: I analyze business requirements for computer based systems and communicate them to technical folks, and then help business users (like sales people) better understand what technical systems can do for them.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: I have been intrigued by the concept that people are not poor because they do not want to work, rather most often people are poor due to their lack of access to capitol. I have an entrepreneurial spirit and have a vision to grow my own business so that the fruit of its growth can help others.
lender.occupational_info: Our Mission is to be the exclusive provider of innovative storage solutions for people who lead active but want organized lifestyles. We want our customers to love our products. We offer our customers a unique product that not only serves their storage needs; we offer an attractive and hip alternative to plastic grocery bags.

lender.name: Greg
lender.loan_because: I want to help make a difference in the world!

lender.name: Amanda
lender.loan_because: I am an entrepreneur myself and wanted to give a helping hand to folks who live in places where it's hard to get started in business.
lender.occupational_info: I make crafts that help people in their prayer life. When people buy my work, I tell them I am using the money to fund loans for people through Kiva.

lender.name: Simon and Gillian
lender.loan_because: There are times when we all need a helping hand.

lender.name: Shailesh Sahasrabuddhe
lender.loan_because: I think theres nothing thats more satisfying than helping others achieve their dreams .. Can you imagine people with loads of cash sitting in their bank checking account earning no interest ? What do they get out of it !?!

lender.name: Tony
lender.loan_because: It's fun and helps others.

lender.name: Fred
lender.loan_because: Life has been good to me.
lender.occupational_info: Retired government employee for the British Columbia Forest Service; responsible for ensuring appropriate grazing by cattle on government land--- describing and monitoring plant communities grazed by livestock.

lender.name: Danielle
lender.loan_because: I believe micro-loans are a successful way to reach personal/financial goals and allow people to lead better lives

lender.name: Lynda
lender.loan_because: I like to help others

lender.name: k fun
lender.loan_because: I want to give back and give a leg up to others.

lender.name: Marco
lender.loan_because: I just heard about microfinancing and I immediately loved the approach. Financing is not something related only to big banks and companies. Everyone can be involved. Everyone matters.
lender.occupational_info: My job consist in the analysis and development of computer software projects.

lender.name: Reynoir
lender.loan_because: I want to make the world a little bit better.

lender.name: SittingBoo
lender.loan_because: As a small business owner I know how hard it can be to get started.

lender.name: Denise
lender.loan_because: I want to empower people to get a better life.Please also support Christmas Future at http://www.christmasfuture.org/dt/
lender.occupational_info: I lead teams to build computer systems for a company that provides phone, television and internet services.

lender.name: Jorunn
lender.loan_because: I think this is a great way to get involved in the world.

lender.name: Anthony
lender.loan_because: It's like being a business banker or something. It really is something exciting and it pays off for the borrower while making me feel good.
lender.occupational_info: Hardware and camping sales.

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: I've lived on that side of the tracks where no one will help you at all, not even your own family. I wouldn't wish that feeling on anyone. So i do my best to help out those who need it.
lender.occupational_info: I am many things. My regular job is a radiographer for the military. After work i am a photographer.

lender.name: howard
lender.loan_because: receipt of small payments has ,perhaps, helped all of at some time in our lives ...may we make them to others whilst we can
lender.occupational_info: developing rural collaborative communities

lender.name: Kara
lender.loan_because: I want to help people

lender.name: Anne
lender.loan_because: Imagine the global impact if each person with the ability to do so perpetually renewed even one Kiva microloan of $25.00. What is worth very little in one place may make a critical difference elsewhere. If you are reading this, chances are you can make a microloan of $25.00. Do it!
lender.occupational_info: I design and hand fabricate jewellery using ancient and modern techniques. I also write poetry and fiction.

lender.name: Robert & Amber
lender.loan_because:
We loan because it makes sense. We have been lucky enough to receive loans when we needed help, so we would like to pay that forward. We have always wanted to make an impact in life. Now we can, one loan at a time!
Kiva borrowers helping Kiva borrowers! We are proud to say that each new loan we are currently participating in is being funded by repayments from Kiva borrowers.
lender.occupational_info: Robert helps bars and restaurants promote their businesses and Amber works for attorneys that handle business lawsuits.

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because:
well...
I like to travel and I saw a lot of povertry I know by myself how dificult it is to raise money to start up own busines. That is the reason I kiva to help people.

lender.name: Tom
lender.loan_because: I find the Asian people to be fantastic entrepreneurs.

lender.name: diana
lender.loan_because: When I was in the Peace Corps I saw what an impact small business ventures could make on family.

lender.name: Melissa
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference.

lender.name: Tracye
lender.loan_because: I enjoy helping people start or maintain their business.

lender.name: David & Sandy
lender.loan_because: I believe it is the best way to change the world's poverty. We who have enough should give and lend to those who need more.
lender.occupational_info: I equip & supply Physical Therapy and Cardiac Rehab departments in Hospitals, and Private practices with all equipment and supplies needed to treat patients.

lender.name: Julia
lender.loan_because: I hope that it will make a difference in other people's lives

lender.name: Marjan
lender.loan_because: I believe in the principle of helping people to maximise their talents and opportunities by supporting their own efforts and plans.
lender.occupational_info: I am responsible for all accounting and logistics (export) tasks within a new and inspiring company.

lender.name: Nadine
lender.loan_because: I want to support people who need just a little bit of help to achieve better living conditions.
lender.occupational_info: I help people of different cultures and languages talk to each other.

lender.name: Alyssa
lender.loan_because: I like to hear their stories and enjoy helping people and their families.

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: I can. It's so important to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I teach English to high school students.

lender.name: SYD
lender.loan_because: Of the love of Jesus Christ for me. I am motatived to love and help those I have never met because he loved me first.
lender.occupational_info: I sell engineered equipment to electric utilities.

lender.name: Rachel
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of giving a donation that will keep coming back to me over and over again -- so that I can help multiple individuals benefit. Plus, it's nice to think that I am helping make someone's life a little better.
lender.occupational_info: I have a variety of skills. Mostly though, I'm concentrated in three areas: Education, Writing, and Library Science. I am working towards my Library Science degree, and want to eventually become an archivist/work in a specialized library collection. For now, I am a professional tutor in an Academic Support Center at my local college. I help students with the writing they need to do for the education department, as well as helping them prepare their final portfolios (a state requirement) for certification of their degrees.

lender.name: Joost
lender.loan_because: I like to help people succeed.
lender.occupational_info: As a project manager, during the day, I help companies with thousands of employees make changes to their computers. At night, as an Imrovisor, I used to perform as an actor in a comedy show to entertain people and I still do so sometimes.

lender.name: Suresh
lender.loan_because: I believe in this type of philanthropy where you teach a man to fish rather than hand outs. This may be the light at the end of the tunnel that we have all been waiting for.
lender.occupational_info: Right use of technology and philanthropy for betterment of man kind irrespective of race,class,caste, creed or geography. We are all one.

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: I care.
lender.occupational_info: Retired from nursing home work as Activity Director. Before that I worked for Girl Scouts of USA as Adult Educator.

lender.name: Robin
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate enough to have the financial ability to do so. A little help can go a long way for people struggling in poor economies.

lender.name: Jana
lender.loan_because: I can use the same money over and over to help those in need.

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: It's not fair that people that are nice can't make a living so they are poor.
lender.occupational_info: My school is a good place to get an edjucation.

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: I want to make the world a better place for my nieces and nephew!
lender.occupational_info: I protect my clients' assets and help them get their businesses up and running after a loss.

lender.name: Hanna
lender.loan_because: "Whatever you do will be insignificant, but it is very important that you do it." Mahatma Gandhi

lender.name: Sherold
lender.loan_because: I want to see give someone the opportunity to succeed. This seed money will grow beyond this project.
lender.occupational_info: I work with women entrepreneurs to uncover their soul's passion and learn online marketing to get known, find their customers and make money.

lender.name: Magala and Olivia-Seone
lender.occupation: study, play games, read and practice violin
lender.loan_because: we know that there are a lot of kids out there that don't have the same opportunity to go to school like we do. We want to change their family"s lives for the better so they can became whatever they want. Like we can!
lender.occupational_info: We are striving to make the world better. It's a big job but we know we can do it! With your help we can reach across the world in no time!

lender.name: Kristen
lender.loan_because: Sometimes we are in a position to be able to give - it benefits everyone to do so. Sometimes we are in a position where we need help. This is life.
lender.occupational_info: I work to promote the safety of children in Canada.

lender.name: Matthew
lender.loan_because: it is one of the simplest and most effective methods to help the people in the world that need the most help.
lender.occupational_info: I try to help save tropical forests for both the animals that inhabitat the forests (e.g. monkeys) and the local people that depend on the services provided by the forests (e.g. a water supply).

lender.name: Sallyanne
lender.loan_because: I used personal loans for graduate school. Now I contribute proactively in my community every school day.
lender.occupational_info: I am a public school teacher. I teach in a very diverse community. There are over 72 languages spoken in our schools. Many of our families are immigrants or refugees.

lender.name: Jim
lender.loan_because: ... I can. Kiva helps make the world seem somewhat smaller by providing opportunities to interact with people from so many distant and diverse countries. Making a loan is a small and manageable contibution in the fight against 3rd world poverty.
lender.occupational_info: Foremost, I am member of a great family, a father of a wonderful daughter and a former child welfare professional.

lender.name: Dennis
lender.loan_because: I want to help those that would have helped me.
lender.occupational_info: Each project I lead is the result of an ability to leverage my knowledge of corporate finance and strengths in financial modeling to explore and participate in new business environments

lender.name: Christine and Jesse
lender.loan_because: We can.
lender.occupational_info: Christine manages the site GoGoMamaGo.com, a blog that features the stories of women and their lives as mothers and entrepreneurs.

lender.name: Jeremy
lender.loan_because: I think it is the best way to promote development.
lender.occupational_info: I help to promote agricultural biodiversity.

lender.name: Georgetown - Team MBA
lender.loan_because: We are a group of business students who want to help people around the world live their dreams.

lender.name: ANGELO
lender.loan_because: helping others to help themselves will uplift the whole planet and ultimately bring about a positive paradigm shift.
lender.occupational_info: I produce positive music for positive change.

lender.name: izuengordelekua
lender.loan_because: I care and believe that another world is possible.

lender.name: Scrapadilly Inc.
lender.loan_because: I love being able to help support other entrepreneurs around the world and watch their success.
lender.occupational_info: Scrapadilly is an online wholesale company that sell scrapbooking, stamping and cardmaking supplies to retailers and world wide.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance of success.
lender.occupational_info: I analyse current systems and identify solutions required for new systems.

lender.name: Jewel
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference and empower people to acheive their potential.

lender.name: Herman
lender.loan_because: I want to help people who are less fortunate then I am

lender.name: Austin
lender.loan_because: in the words of FDR: "the test of our progress is not whether we add more to the abundance of those who have much; it is whether we provide enough for those who have too little."

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: "As a weapon against poverty in developing countries, microcredit is as vital as education, health, human rights and good government." -- A Billion Bootstraps
lender.occupational_info: Always changing.

lender.name: Rachelle
lender.loan_because: A little goes a long way

lender.name: Suellen
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: MollyKaye & Steve
lender.loan_because: we're all one world!

lender.name: Kasey
lender.loan_because: $25 makes a much bigger difference in somebody else's life.

lender.name: Nik
lender.whereabouts: Washington DC and San Francisco, CA
lender.loan_because: It helps.

lender.name: linda
lender.loan_because: i have always wanted to help people realize their own potential in their lives through entrepreneurship. i respect all people who have ideas and dreams that they wish to see come about for the betterment of themselves, their families and their communities.
lender.occupational_info: i have studied plants in college and have worked for many years doing landscape designs for people who wish to create a beautiful outside environment around their homes and places of business. i live in a challenging climate for growing plants--it is often too hot, too cold, too wet or too dry. my job requires a great deal of plant knowledge to be successful!

lender.name: Mélanie
lender.loan_because: I loan because I think this is, for now, the best way I have found to help and give back.

lender.name: Sue
lender.loan_because: I have always had a heart for Micro Finance. This is the BEST way to help others in developing countries.
lender.occupational_info: I work with computers in a large company in Austalia.

lender.name: Nigel
lender.loan_because: It feels incredibly good to know that I am helping another person have a better life with my financial support.
lender.occupational_info: I raise funds for a non-profit hospice that cares for terminally ill people in Northwest Florida and lower Alabama regardless of their ability to pay for the care/

lender.name: Amanda
lender.loan_because: my brother sent me a gift certificate. I find this concept facinating.

lender.name: Valerie
lender.loan_because: I feel very blessed and fortunate in my life. I have many wonderful friends and family members who have given me help when I needed it. I want to help other hard working people succeed.
lender.occupational_info:
I design and make costumes and clothing, often from recycled materials like used clothing. My two grandmothers taught me how to sew when I was very young, and I love to make clothes, as well as think of new designs.
.

lender.name: In Memory of Zdena
lender.loan_because: 'I would like to support other people to have success."

lender.name: George
lender.loan_because: in a small way, I can aford it.
lender.occupational_info: I am manager of a seaside inn during the summer in the USA and in winter live in Costa Rica. I enjoy the best of both worlds

lender.name: Grant
lender.loan_because: i can
lender.occupational_info: I work on roads and transport infrastructure

lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because: I want to do my part to help reduce the appalling poverty in this world. Even in ones 90ies one can help.

lender.name: Kevin
lender.loan_because: I want to do a little something to promote freedom and prosperity. If enough people would do this, it would be more effective than sending billions of dollars to corrupt and ineffectual governments.
lender.occupational_info: I handle huge amounts of money each day. It comes from people who don't know enough to do something productive with it. So they waste it on gambling. I'm not proud of what I do, but it pays the bills.

lender.name: Nanci
lender.loan_because: Women helping women is important to me. Other women have reached out to me when I have needed a hand and I want to do the same.
lender.occupational_info: I am the director of a program that provides assistance to victims of abuse and violence.

lender.name: Madeleine Mfuru
lender.loan_because: I could have been easily been someone on this site requesting a loan from an American. I am from Tanzania and I have been fortunate to grow up in the USA and I want to give back and help at least one woman from my country beat poverty. I know how hard it is to find and keep a job there. I am honored to be a part of Kiva.
lender.occupational_info: I monitor the Security and Access for a system called SAP. I make sure that the proper people are are using the system

lender.name: Zachary
lender.loan_because: I enjoy helping others and believe that Kiva is a strong, safe, and interesting way to make a difference.

lender.name: Bob
lender.loan_because: To make a difference by empowering others to change the world

lender.name: Nathan
lender.loan_because:
Shaun Hemsley donated $25 to me to start loaning money, and I will be lending us much money as I can spare to help people out on here :)
I live in a country that has so much to offer, even the poorest of people aren't really poor compared to other countries, and if I can make a little difference in someones life then that's a good thing :)
lender.occupational_info: I clean at a hospital. It is interesting work :)

lender.name: paul
lender.loan_because: It helps out someone less fortunate and makes me fell good at the same time.Win win situation.

lender.name: Drunken Samaritans
lender.loan_because: ...I drink.
lender.occupational_info: Eat, drink, and be magnanimous!

lender.name: Monique
lender.loan_because: I was given a chance to become self-employed 21 years ago, I want to pay that forward.
lender.occupational_info: Accounting, business consulting

lender.name: Lorraine
lender.loan_because: There is such need in the world and little by little each person can help.

lender.name: Andrea
lender.loan_because: I want to help give women the chance to improve their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I help companies get their website to the top of search engine results.

lender.name: Thomas
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do! :)

lender.name: Rhonda
lender.loan_because: ... I can...and in this small way, I can make a difference!

lender.name: pam
lender.loan_because: I have always believed that it is better to teach a man to fish than feed a man a fish. it is a privilege to be able to help people to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: "professional" volunteer helping non-profit organizations with fund-raising.

lender.name: Joey
lender.loan_because: I want to ensure people have an opportunity to be successful and contribute in the form of small business.
lender.occupational_info: I assist with the administrative functions of hiring and retaining employees for a software company.

lender.name: Snezana & Thomas
lender.loan_because: We make a living by what we get, but we make a life by what we give.

lender.name: Bernie & Cathy Schmidt
lender.occupation: Parts/Warranty Manager and Senior Media Designer
lender.loan_because: It is the people of the world that make the difference not the governments. Make your footprint on this world to make it a better place.
lender.occupational_info: More fulfilling now that we have extra income to help other people across the world.

lender.name: Edgar
lender.loan_because: I care and believe in compassionate capitalism.

lender.name: Matt and Katie
lender.loan_because: We are blessed and we want to give back
lender.occupational_info: Matt is a programmer at a financial services firm and Katie is a math teacher in 7th and 8th grade.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: I believe in empowering individuals in oder to build a strong and sustainable world.
lender.occupational_info: I have a "normal" job as a claims adjuster but spend the majority of my time working on an education resource website IBEC. Here is our mission statement if you are interested: "Recognizing the immense value of education, wide-spread obstacles to its accessibility, and the collaborative potential of the Internet, IBEC was created to give everyone with Internet access a place to teach and learn."

lender.name: Tammy
lender.loan_because: sometimes we all need a little help to make our lives better.
lender.occupational_info: I serve drinks and food, and help provide comfort to people traveling on airplanes.

lender.name: Dana
lender.loan_because: ...because I want to empower people to hopefully in turn lend to someone else one day. I want to help women around the world become successful on their own terms. I really believe that micro-loans provide opportunities that may not have ever been possible before.
lender.occupational_info: I work with designing, implementing and improving systems at a telecommunications company.

lender.name: Charles
lender.occupational_info: long hours, heavy tools, dirty oily equipment. and a very dangerous place to work.

lender.name: Annalisa and Daniel
lender.loan_because: It's a wonderful way to make a difference, not only for one person but for their entire family and community.
lender.occupational_info: I am a veterinary internist for dogs and cats.

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: In an increasingly globalized society, our neighbors are no longer next door. They are all over the world and we need to help them.

lender.name: Ann & Julia
lender.loan_because: It's a good idea that may do some good.

lender.name: Carl
lender.loan_because: Everything is related and what goes around comes around.
lender.occupational_info: I regulate financial markets.

lender.name: Thomas
lender.loan_because: I feel we all have an obligation to do what we can for those who are less fortunate.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a personal lines insurance agent for AIG. I am also a student @ Binghamton University, majoring in Philosophy, Politics, and Law.

lender.name: Tarheel Nutrition
lender.loan_because: We are trying to grow and expand our business just like people on Kiva. We will be investing 5% of all companies profits to Kiva.
lender.occupational_info: We are a small business that will be opening on March 21st, 2008 and we will sale real fruit smoothies and sport supplements like protein powder and vitamins inside large fitness clubs in North Carolina, U.S.A.

lender.name: Caity
lender.loan_because: "the art of being kind is all this world needs."

lender.name: Nick
lender.loan_because: This can be a piece of the puzzle to give others a hand up.
lender.occupational_info: Student at Tulane University

lender.name: Marianne
lender.loan_because: Being a single woman with two children myself I know how women around the world fight every day to have a decent, normal and happy life. Since I have some ressources that I can spare, I would like to help my sisters in less fortunate parts of the world by lending them money to - hopefully - make them able to make a better life for themselves.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: I hope to make a difference.

lender.name: Speleostalker
lender.loan_because: It' s nice to contribute implementing people dreams.

lender.name: Isaac
lender.loan_because: One on one...we can make a difference...we don't need governments or big corporations. This is one man helping another in need. Peace and mad love.
lender.occupational_info: I provide safety, comfort, and service on an airplane.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I belive that the world should share its wealth. if some of my money can help individuals improve their quality of life then this can only be a good thing.
lender.occupational_info: I create special effects for feature films. I work long hours on a computer multi-layering images together to make them look real. I add anything from monsters to cities, from skys to explosions to a shot so that the final image looks athough it was filmed all at once and in a real situation.

lender.name: Rajib
lender.loan_because: I love poor people
lender.occupational_info: Software Engineer

lender.name: Juliette
lender.loan_because: I think it's a fantastic way to help people to help themselves and I really want to support people who are trying so hard to change their lives.
lender.occupational_info: Training adults to communicate better with each other: in other languages and understanding cultural differences. We help companies to internationalize. In addition I also do translation and interpreting for all kinds of international organisations and businesses.

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: I like to help those people who are helping themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I manage people who design aircraft.

lender.name: Dee
lender.loan_because: It's a way to make a big difference to other peoples lives

lender.name: Dog Walking Melbourne
lender.loan_because: Dog Walking Melbourne likes to help out in the community.
lender.occupational_info: I provide dog walking, pet minding and pet transportation services.

lender.name: Nathan
lender.loan_because: I can; because it's my way of giving to others in underdeveloped countries. I'm not rich, I know how it is to be lacking in money.
lender.occupational_info: I like cycling, photography, the beach, swiming, hiking, and surfing the internet.

lender.name: Els and Sjoerd
lender.loan_because: we want to help
lender.occupational_info: help people with musculer problems.

lender.name: Adam
lender.loan_because: my wife and I believe in helping people(particularly women) become more empowered. Loaning people money to start a small business may boost their ability to provide for themselves and their families forever.
lender.occupational_info: I install services that allow businesses to access the internet.

lender.name: Melissa
lender.loan_because: I Want To Help Those That Are In Need. Especially When They Are Doing Something Positive That Benefits Many Others.
lender.occupational_info: I'm A Home Maker. I Raise 3 Beautiful Boys And Maintain Our House Hold. I Am The Financial Consultant, The Secretary, The Advocate, The Chef, And Many Other Titles.

lender.name: Cheryl
lender.loan_because: I have been where they are: I wasn't asking for a handout.... just a hand. Just as they are. I am surviving... one day at a time. Through hard work, dedication and the desire to do so. I'm like many of them, but I truly believe, ... It is in giving that we receive...

lender.name: Susan & Ross
lender.loan_because: we care!

lender.name: Vicki
lender.loan_because: pay it forward people....

lender.name: Yuki
lender.loan_because: I live with my husband,but we don't have any children. I just would like to help children and their mothers in poverty.

lender.name: St. Aloysius Church
lender.loan_because: Helping those in need is an important part of serving Jesus Christ.
lender.occupational_info: The fundamental aim of our Religious Education Program is to put each child "not only in touch but in communion, in intimacy, with Jesus Christ: only He can lead us to the love of the Father in the Spirit and make us share in the life of the Holy Trinity" (John Paul II). We strive to help each child know the Catholic Faith, to celebrate it in the sacraments, to grow in Holiness, and to grow in prayer. Our Religious Education program serves students from Pre-K - Grade 8.

lender.name: Shirley Ann
lender.whereabouts: Cagayan de oro city Misamis Oriental
lender.loan_because: to put up my own business in my hometown.
lender.occupational_info: buy and sell of RTW's and accessories.

lender.name: Vanessa
lender.loan_because: I strongly believe in the transformative power of microfinance.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a microenterprise resource center that provides services that directly benefit the low income consumer of financial services, working to increase their access to and understanding of well-designed and delivered financial services.

lender.name: Carson
lender.loan_because: As a student I'm not exactly well off, at times living paycheck to paycheck, but I'm comfortable enough that I can (and do) routinely waste money on things I don't even remotely need. Thought I should do something constructive with what I have once in a while.
lender.occupational_info: Currently studying for a Masters in American Literature. I love to read and write, and hope to some day have a career in publishing.

lender.name: SASB
lender.loan_because: i feel these people shouldn't have to live in poverty forever.
lender.occupational_info: i work hard i school to get a great education.

lender.name: Vanier College
lender.loan_because: Part of our mission is developing citizens of the world and to help our students participate fully in Quebec society and the world.
lender.occupational_info: Post-secondary educational institution in Montreal, Canada. Language of instruction is in English and average age of students is 19 yrs.. Students at Vanier College have a diverse background. Most students are multi-lingual.

lender.name: Lisette
lender.loan_because: I would like to make a difference in the world - I would like to change it
lender.occupational_info: I work with developing medicines for humans. eg. Insuline.

lender.name: Ruth
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I look for junk and recycle it; paint etc. I also do mendhi (temporary henna tattoos). I have worked outside the home until very recently and enjoy being a homemaker while still making a couple of dollars.

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: I see the need for enterpreneurship as the method to resolve poverty in the world and hapiness for next generations
lender.occupational_info: to assist enterpreneurs to empower and trade in a holistic long term sustainable way

lender.name: Monica & Peter & Jana
lender.loan_because: we want to make the world a better place for everyone.

lender.name: Brandon
lender.loan_because: I want to help other people. I am thankful for the opportunities that I have been given.

lender.name: Alex
lender.loan_because: All the cool kids are doing it!

lender.name: Jean
lender.loan_because: I think giving loans is about giving people a chance.
lender.occupational_info: As an entrepreneur I'm involved in multiple businesses. The most exiting ones are: - developing Point-Of-Sale software - working as a strategic ICT consultant, advising companies on how to setup R&D projects in ICT. - running a Bed & Breakfast with my wife Raissa.

lender.name: Liz
lender.loan_because: I am pleased I have the opportunity to help other people develop their businesses, which support their families and local communities.
lender.occupational_info: I am responsible for providing analytical and administrative support to a sales & marketing department for an international car rental company.

lender.name: Heidi and Tony
lender.loan_because: it is a good thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: advising other people how to improve their work

lender.name: Dario
lender.loan_because: I know how important having access to credit is to a small business.
lender.occupational_info: I am a Private Real Estate Investor, investing in single family and small multi-family properties in the Canada and the US.

lender.name: Shashikiran
lender.loan_because: It feels good to help.

lender.name: Salvador
lender.loan_because: this world must be shared among all it's inhabitants, because we must not wait on others to make little changes that can make life better in this world. I loan because I can afford it today and because we never now what will happen tomorrow.
lender.occupational_info: I create Internet solutions.

lender.name: Anthony
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Ana Paula Rimoli
lender.loan_because: I have to
lender.occupational_info: I make toys :)

lender.name: Jazmyn
lender.loan_because: It's a hand UP, not a hand out. It's an easy way to make a difference.

lender.name: Corine & Jaap
lender.loan_because: We want to help people , to have a chance of a better life .

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: All should have the opportunity to participate in the growing global economy.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: It works.
lender.occupational_info: Software for global development and humanitarian relief.

lender.name: Olga
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Chantelle
lender.loan_because: it's such an easy and inexpensive thing to do. It's amazing to think that the weekly cost of my coffee can help change someone's life.
lender.occupational_info: I work for one of San Francisco's premier hospitals in the research division and contribute to projects that support research for breast cancer, osteoporosis and longevity.

lender.name: Angela
lender.loan_because: I got this gift for my birthday from my mom and she really got me into this i really enjoy it. Im really happy that I can help people from all over the world. This is a great website for people that need help and im happy to help.

lender.name: Tea
lender.loan_because: hopefully we can help others who want to build a better life!

lender.name: Adrienne
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: SUSAN AWORI
lender.loan_because: i loan because people also lend me.
lender.occupational_info: I need a serious Donor who can lend me USD $ 50,000.00 to build a clinic and make sure that all people in the community get best treatment.any Good Samaritan and Faithful Donor can e-mail: aworisusan@yahoo.com and can call me in Uganda +256 752310158 in Jesus names i will be very greatful for that connection.

lender.name: Jennifer & boys
lender.loan_because: My boys and I have been incredibly blessed to be born in the United States and to have health insurance, good schools and reliable long-term income. Kiva enables us to help others realize their dreams and to support their families.

lender.name: Ravi
lender.loan_because: I believe in the honor of helping others in the best way that I can.
lender.occupational_info: I am a professor and I teach students about computers and websites.

lender.name: Ann-Sofie
lender.loan_because: I think I am really privileged myself, having had possibilities to educate myself, getting a job, etc - this is my way of supporting people that have less opportunities but a strong will to make things better for themselves and for their families.

lender.name: Stephanie
lender.loan_because: It takes so little sacrifice to change someone's life and community. Where else could I do that?
lender.occupational_info: I work in conservation and local food issues.

lender.name: Jonathan
lender.loan_because: I didn't want to wait for the future to have the freedom to make an impact. I wanted to make one now.
lender.occupational_info: I'm basically a commercial credit auditor at National City.

lender.name: Stef
lender.loan_because: I am an entrepreneur myself, and like to support other entrepreneurs.
lender.occupational_info: I run an IT-consulting business in The Netherlands, VLC

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: I care. I hope my small contributions can incite big changes in the lives of others around the world.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a photographer and life long student. I'm an avid animal lover and have been accused (more than once!) of being horse crazy.

lender.name: Christoph
lender.loan_because: I like visiting people during my travellings. And I can help: this is the way we can help people to help themselves!
lender.occupational_info: I am setting up the lighting for movies with my guys - lot of planing, lot of work with heavy gear and lot of fun when the picture is looking good

lender.name: Nargis
lender.loan_because: I would like to help people.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: I feel I have the responsibility to help others with the wealth I have.
lender.occupational_info: I build computer Software for remittance (Sending money from one country to another without the help of a bank)

lender.name: Darlene
lender.loan_because: I want someone else to have an opportunity to make a better life for themselves and their families, thereby bettering the entire world
lender.occupational_info: When someone wants to buy a house, they come to see someone like me about getting a loan to buy the house with. Kind of like loaning them money-only on a bigger scale

lender.name: Rebecca
lender.loan_because: Helping people individually to help themselves seems like a good idea and has a more obvious result then donating to a larger organization and seems like a solution rather then a temporary fix to some problems.
lender.occupational_info: I work on computers, writing software. I have to talk to many people to make sure what I do fits in with the big picture and that what I'm doing actually is solving a problem.

lender.name: Erin
lender.loan_because: I believe in love and equality

lender.name: Xavier
lender.loan_because: it's time to give back...

lender.name: Penny
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Lee
lender.loan_because: My thoughtful sister sent me a $25.00 gift of Kiva to help get my mind off myself/chemo treatments by helping someone else and it feels good!
lender.occupational_info: I sell granite countertops and marble vanities-I love stone and always collected rocks as a kid!

lender.name: Jaime
lender.loan_because: I loan for the same reasons I became a teacher. I want to help others by improving their quality of life.
lender.occupational_info: I teach very young, underpriviledged children how to read and write.

lender.name: Blessed Sacrament PJ's
lender.loan_because: To whom much is given, much is expected.
lender.occupational_info: We are the Peace and Justice Committee of Blessed Sacrament Parish in Seattle. We are committed to the corporal works of mercy and social justice.

lender.name: Christiane
lender.loan_because: I would like to see more equality in the world I believe women can turn the world around if they take charge of their local economies on a small and large scale
lender.occupational_info: I am the director of a large childcare center that serves working parents with low to moderate incomes

lender.name: Matthew
lender.loan_because: $25 can make a significant difference in other countries.
lender.occupational_info: I pick up and deliver freight across the united states.

lender.name: Rob
lender.loan_because: Teaching somebody how to fish is better then handing him or her a fish. I have been blessed in life with good teachers and the health to work hard.
lender.occupational_info: The best job in the world. My passion is my work, running a media business around classic and sports cars.

lender.name: Aamir
lender.loan_because: Karma Zakat
lender.occupational_info: Student Photographer

lender.name: Clare
lender.loan_because: you get what you give.

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: I am looking for ways to help other people without government, religious, or economic influences - Kiva offers this opportunity.
lender.occupational_info: I sold my business that I started and ran for 26 years. I have a lot of compassion for entrepreneurs and I am thankful that I can help others in this way.

lender.name: daname
lender.loan_because: "Celui à qui la souffrance est épargnée doit se sentir appelé à soulager celle des autres." Albert Schweitzer

lender.name: Ryan
lender.loan_because: My sister gave us, Sarah and I, a gift certificate as a Christmas present. We have always had more than we need, so we are excited to see others excel with a little help. We love Jesus Christ and look for anyway to share and spread His love.
lender.occupational_info: We are currently students at Purdue University in the United States. We plan on getting married this June. I will work in construction for providing clean water and waste removal; while Sarah will help people recover from injury with massage and exercise.

lender.name: Bib & Sandra
lender.loan_because: We can

lender.name: Anne-Marie
lender.loan_because: I want to help others succeed and do well. If we all shared some of our resources, the world would be a little bit better!

lender.name: Chris & Susan
lender.loan_because: To help others in the name of Jesus

lender.name: Roger
lender.loan_because: my wife, a teacher, was in the Peace Corps in the Dominican Republic in the late 1960's.
lender.occupational_info: Locate land boundaries for highway construction work

lender.name: Jeanie
lender.loan_because: I enjoy the volunteer experience whether it's "hands on" in mission or "money on" in loaning!
lender.occupational_info: I provide medications to elderly patients living in the community, assisted living and residential care

lender.name: Frank
lender.loan_because: I love you and want you to be happy! :)
lender.occupational_info: MS student in microbiology at University of Minnesota. Studying gene regulation in Enterococcus bacteria.

lender.name: Charles
lender.loan_because: I lend through KIVA because I am very commited to helping Hispanic business owners start and succeed in a way that greatly improves the quality of their lives and the lives of their families. My primary focus in on Latin America.
lender.occupational_info: I am dedicated to teaching Hispanic entrepreneurs how to discover their ideal business and market their products and services successfully starting with very little money.

lender.name: lori
lender.loan_because: it is a beautiful idea and I wish all these people much prosperity.
lender.occupational_info: Transform lives of people that are affected by addiction, depression or anxiety

lender.name: Floyd
lender.loan_because: Love
lender.occupational_info: Manage day to day operations of drilling rig. Currently drilling for natural gas in the Rocky Mountain region of Colorado. I work 24/7 for 33 days then go home to North East Arkansas for 11 days. When at work I live on the drilling site. As of 9/15/2010 working in California on 14k oil wells

lender.name: Rob
lender.loan_because: I want to change the world and this is one of the ways I'm trying to do so.

lender.name: Mango
lender.loan_because: I am blessed and have a very loving family. I make loans because it is the right thing to do!
lender.occupational_info: I catch mice, rats and, other small rodents. I leave the mouse barbacoa for the humans. I don't like mouse barbacoa. I do not think my owners like it either but I leave it on the doormat anyway.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: This is a most effective way to help the less fortunate in other countries to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I am the vice president and chief instructional officer of a public community college in the State of Alabama.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: 1 John 3:17-18 - If anyone has material possessions and sees his brother in need but has no pity on him, how can the love of God be in him? Let us not love with words or tongue but with actions and in truth.
lender.occupational_info: These pretzels are making me thirsty!

lender.name: Bradley
lender.loan_because: I am in a position to help other people in this world who weren't born as lucky as I was. Fundamentally, I am no different than they are.
lender.occupational_info: I study physics, in order to understand how the world works. I teach physics, to educate others so that they might use that knowledge to go out and make the world a little better.

lender.name: Sarah & Jeremy Nelson
lender.loan_because: We loan because we believe in helping those less fortunate to empower themselves and improve their future!
lender.occupational_info: Jeremy - I am a postdoc researching a new type of solar cell and am also working with the university tech transfer office, which assists researchers in commercializing their inventions. Sarah - I am a recruiter and work for a temporary staffing agency that assist people in finding jobs/careers.

lender.name: xueyun
lender.loan_because: Hi, I come from China. I am building a website called China-Life Familiar now and my goal is to extend our branch to every city of China to let it become one of the most important living-information media of each city. But we are currently short of 600,000 US dollars to pay our fees of development, advertizement and maintenance, and also other fees such as server, bandwidth, labor costs, etc.
lender.occupational_info: I am working with a whole team, which successfully developed the structure of the website and achieved our initial goal. Since China has a huge potential market of over 600 cities, so we are full of confidence to make this website as popular as www.craiqslist.org to United States.

lender.name: Michael Slattery
lender.loan_because: I believe that microfinance is an effective development tool and one way to participate in a global and civil society.
lender.occupational_info: I am currently a civil servant with the Canadian federal government.

lender.name: Josh
lender.loan_because: enguinity makes the world strong and should be given a chance to flourish.
lender.occupational_info: I teach World History to 12-13 year old kids in Los Angeles, California.

lender.name: Eva
lender.occupational_info: I oversee a nonprofit helping children and families infected with or affected by HIV or AIDS through cost free programs and education.
